CustomField.description: Field to store the Agreement's start date
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)), ( CASE ( MONTH ( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) , 1, $Label.MonthJan, 2, $Label.MonthFeb, 3, $Label.MonthMar, 4, $Label.MonthApr, 5, $Label.MonthMay, 6, $Label.MonthJun, 7, $Label.MonthJul, 8, $Label.MonthAug, 9, $Label.MonthSep, 10, $Label.MonthOct, 11, $Label.MonthNov, $Label.MonthDec)) +' '+Text ( DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) )+' '+Text (YEAR ( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) ),Null)
CustomField.label: Agreement Start Date
